channel.title: Need HELP banning and ip banning
channel.description:
testscape source
I NEED help ip banning! i open up the connectedfrom folder to see where the the ip then i put it in the banned.dat and it doesn't ban them!! it worked *once* with a simple ip like... 98.989.98.98 but not the long ones.... i need help getting rid of a few assholes plox >_>
also is it possible to just ban one single account?

item.title: Need HELP banning and ip banning
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Click Here:

depending on which source that its on, there are commands already there for you e.g ::ban(user) or ::ipban(user)

Seeing as this thread is from 2006, can you delete every post off it (But not lock it, as it will continue to get in the way) so that it goes back to the bottom?

Read full topic
item.source: Need HELP banning and ip banning
